data.description: Pure Perl MySQL driver for the DBI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBD::mysqlPP is a Pure Perl client interface for the MySQL
    database. This module implements network protool between server and
    client of MySQL, thus you don't need external MySQL client library
    like libmysqlclient for this module to work. It means this module
    enables you to connect to MySQL server from some operation systems
    which MySQL is not ported.
